title._content: William T. Snyder And Orie O. Miller, 1968

tag.raw: Orie O. Miller Mennonite Central Committee Mennonite Church
tag.author: 52529054@N06

description._content:
Caption: Orie O. Miller, executive secretary emeritus of the Mennonite Central Committee, was honored on the occasion of his 75th year at a fellowship dinner in connection with the annual meeting of the MCC, Chicago, January 19-20. After expressions of appreciation from several of Orie's colleagues, William T. Snyder, executive secretary, presented a certificate of recognition.

Citation: Paul Erb Photograph Collection. HM4-345 SC Folder 2 Negative 237. Mennonite Church USA Archives - Goshen. Goshen, Indiana.
